useCase.name: Generate Secret Key
useCase.description: Generate a secure secret key for cryptographic operations.

preconditions.precondition: SecureRandom and NativeCrypto libraries are available.

mainSequence.step: User requests a secret key generation.
SecureRandom passes generated bytes to NativeCrypto.
NativeCrypto creates a Uint8List from the bytes.
SecretKey receives the Uint8List and forms the SecretKey.
